user_prompt: As a bank customer, I require a modern, user-friendly self-service portal that allows me to efficiently manage my banking needs without visiting physical branches. I need to securely log in using multi-factor authentication and access a personalized dashboard displaying available banking products and services based on my profile and eligibility. The portal must enable me to submit account opening requests and service modifications through streamlined workflows requiring minimal clicks. I expect to receive real-time status updates and email notifications regarding my submitted requests. The system should maintain a comprehensive history of all my interactions while ensuring my sensitive financial data remains secure. The portal must be responsive across various devices, providing a consistent experience whether I access it via desktop, tablet, or mobile phone. I should be able to save incomplete applications and return to them later, with the ability to upload necessary documentation directly through the interface. The solution must integrate seamlessly with the bank's existing core banking system while maintaining its own database to ensure optimal performance and reliability. Role-based access controls must be implemented to ensure I can only view and access services appropriate to my profile and authorization level.

epics.title: Secure Customer Authentication and Access Control
epics.summary: Implement secure multi-factor authentication and role-based access control for the portal.
epics.description: Develop and deploy a robust authentication system that supports multi-factor authentication (MFA), including password and OTP, biometrics, or app-based verification. Implement role-based access controls (RBAC) to ensure customers can only view and access features and services authorized for their roles and profiles. Use encryption for all credentials, enforce modern password policies, control login sessions, and adhere to banking and regulatory security standards.

epics.title: Personalized Customer Dashboard
epics.summary: Develop a personalized dashboard to display relevant products and services based on customer profiles.
epics.description: Create a user-friendly, dynamic dashboard that presents each customer with a customized overview of their accounts, services, and product eligibility. Integrate data feeds from the core banking system to show balances, active products, and recommendations. The dashboard should support real-time updates and intuitive navigation to enable quick access to key functionalities. Include personalized widgets that enhance user engagement and increase service uptake.

epics.title: Responsive and Accessible User Interface
epics.summary: Build a responsive and accessible front-end interface usable across devices.
epics.description: Design and implement a modern, responsive front-end optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile devices. Ensure that layout, navigation, and functionality adapt seamlessly to various screen sizes. Prioritize accessibility, providing compliance with WCAG standards and support for assistive technologies. Incorporate a cohesive design system that delivers visual consistency, usability, and speed across all supported browsers and devices.

epics.title: Online Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
epics.summary: Enable customers to open new accounts and modify existing services through guided workflows.
epics.description: Develop guided digital workflows that allow customers to open new bank accounts or make modifications to existing services without visiting branches. Each workflow should feature real-time validation, contextual guidance, and prefilled data to minimize clicks and user effort. Integrate securely with backend systems for verification, approvals, and record updates. The goal is to create seamless, fast, and transparent self-service experiences for customers.

epics.title: Document Upload and Management
epics.summary: Develop functionality for secure document upload and verification.
epics.description: Implement a document management module allowing users to securely upload and view documents required for account opening or service modification requests. Enforce file validation and encryption during upload and storage. Include progress indicators, resumable uploads, and audit trails. Ensure the module integrates with the bank’s document verification and compliance systems, maintaining adherence to regulatory document retention standards.

epics.title: Save and Resume Application Functionality
epics.summary: Allow customers to save incomplete workflows and continue later.
epics.description: Develop the ability for customers to save partial progress during account opening or service change processes and resume later without data loss. This should include session handling, secure temporary data storage, and auto-save mechanisms. Customers should receive reminders for incomplete applications and be able to resume securely after authentication, ensuring enhanced convenience and higher completion rates.

epics.title: Real-Time Status Tracking and Notifications
epics.summary: Implement real-time tracking of submitted requests and notifications for updates.
epics.description: Provide real-time visibility into the status of all customer requests, such as account openings or modifications. Develop an alert and notification system that updates customers via email, SMS, or in-portal messages when changes occur in their request status. Allow users to customize notification preferences. Ensure synchronization with backend processing systems for accurate, automated updates to enhance transparency and reduce support inquiries.

epics.title: Comprehensive Customer Interaction History
epics.summary: Maintain a detailed history of customer interactions and requests within the portal.
epics.description: Create a full interaction log that documents all customer activities, including logins, transactions, service modifications, and application submissions. Provide an accessible view for customers to review their past interactions securely. The system should support detailed filtering and export options while ensuring data immutability and compliance with banking record-keeping standards. This feature enhances transparency, dispute management, and regulatory readiness.

epics.title: Core Banking System Integration
epics.summary: Integrate the self-service portal with the bank’s core banking platform.
epics.description: Implement a secure integration layer between the self-service portal and the bank’s core banking systems to enable real-time data exchange. Use APIs and middleware for robust communication, ensuring transactional consistency, data synchronization, and reliability. The integration should support mutual authentication, error handling, and asynchronous updates for scalability while maintaining compliance with security and auditing practices.

epics.title: Dedicated Portal Database and Data Optimization
epics.summary: Create a dedicated database to support portal operations and performance.
epics.description: Develop a dedicated, high-performance database designed to handle portal-specific workloads independently from the core banking environment. Implement efficient indexing, caching, and data retrieval mechanisms to optimize responsiveness. Ensure all sensitive information is encrypted, access-controlled, and backed up regularly. The database should support scalability to handle growth in customer adoption and data volume.

epics.title: End-to-End Security and Compliance Framework
epics.summary: Implement comprehensive security and compliance controls across the portal stack.
epics.description: Ensure that all system layers—from authentication through data storage and communications—adhere to financial security best practices and regulatory requirements. Implement continuous monitoring, vulnerability assessment, encryption, and intrusion detection. The system must comply with GDPR, PCI DSS, and local financial authority standards. Establish regular auditing, logging, and incident response mechanisms to maintain operational integrity and regulatory assurance.
